Elliotte Harold wrote:

> Typically I try to give my constructors correct exception chaining
> functionality in both Java 1.3 and earlier and Java 1.4 and later.

I forgot to zoom in on this one.

So sometimes it's

super(message, cause);

and sometimes it's

super(message);
initCause(cause);

and sometimes it's something else....

Yes, I can see how that would drive me to drink, then write tests once I 
sober up.

Thanks for the example!
